name: Centre for Youth and Social Development

address: Gangadhar Meher Marg, P.O. R R L

briefDescription: CYSD propels its vision of an equitable society with its mission of enabling women, women and  children to improve their quality of life ensuring transparent, gender-sensitive, accountable and democratic governance, through its three inter-dependent interventions of participatory action, resource support and policy research and advocacy at different levels, for a pro-poor regime based on a Human Rights' Perspective. CYSD’s key thematic areas of intervention revolves around Sustainable rural livelihoods; Fostering inclusive governance; advocating for responsive state; and reducing disaster vulnerability and addressing climate change concerns for the State’s development.CYSD reaches to 2.39 lakh people covering 36,578 families of 798 villages in 124 GPs of 29 Blocks with geographical location of 8 tribal Districts of Odisha like Koraput, Malkangiri, Rayagada, Mayurbhanj,Keonjhar, Bolangiri, Kalahandi, Sundargarh and one coastal i.e. Khurda.
